Safe HaskellSafe-Infered

Util.TreeGenerator

Description

Module used for generate 'NTree Cell' from lists.

Synopsis

  • type Name = String
  • type Level = (Name, [[[String]]])
  • generate :: [Level] -> NTree Cell

Documentation

type Name = StringSource

Name of a level (= name of a column = label name).

type Level = (Name, [[[String]]])Source

Level, represent a level of the tree in a list way. There is a list in the first level of the list, for each nodes on the level above. And the list in the second level contains lists representing nodes for this Level.

generateSource

Arguments

:: [Level]

List of levels.

-> NTree Cell

The tree built from the levels.

generate, generate a tree given the levels.
